record.title: Isolate genomes from "Ecogenomics of groundwater viruses suggests niche differentiation linked to specific environmental tolerance"
record.description: Ecogenomics of groundwater viruses suggests niche differentiation linked to specific environmental tolerance. This Narrative contains data for the 261 ENIGMA isolates described in the paper. See Table S2 for a complete list.
